description.last_approved_text: These men are our kin. If they are willing to repent their actions we should offer them a place among our ranks.

campaign_post_battle_captive_options.description: These men are our kin. If they are willing to repent their actions we should offer them a place among our ranks.

description.last_approved_text: Enslave these fools - break them and consume their souls!

campaign_post_battle_captive_options.description: Enslave these fools - break them and consume their souls!

description.last_approved_text: Press these Dawi into binding oaths and bring them into your throng.

campaign_post_battle_captive_options.description: Press these Dawi into binding oaths and bring them into your throng.

description.last_approved_text: These scraggy gits look tasty - eat 'em up and replenish the boyz with full stomachs!

campaign_post_battle_captive_options.description: These scraggy gits look tasty - eat 'em up and replenish the boyz with full stomachs!

description.last_approved_text: Force these troops to change allegiance and allow them to serve in your army.

campaign_post_battle_captive_options.description: Force these troops to change allegiance and allow them to serve in your army.

description.last_approved_text: Dominate these enemy minions! Let your will subsume the lingering influence of any pitiful liche before and enshrine your majesty in its place.

campaign_post_battle_captive_options.description: Dominate these enemy minions! Let your will subsume the lingering influence of any pitiful liche before and enshrine your majesty in its place.

description.last_approved_text: Dragged to sacrifice before the herdstone, captives are ripped apart and consumed by the ever-ravenous Beastmen.

campaign_post_battle_captive_options.description: Dragged to sacrifice before the herdstone, captives are ripped apart and consumed by the ever-ravenous Beastmen.

description.last_approved_text: Force these troops to change allegiance and allow them to serve in your army.

campaign_post_battle_captive_options.description: Force these troops to change allegiance and allow them to serve in your army.

description.last_approved_text: For standing against our righteous cause, these men must pay the ultimate price. Kill them all.

campaign_post_battle_captive_options.description: For standing against our righteous cause, these men must pay the ultimate price. Kill them all.

description.last_approved_text: Slaughter the captives in the name of the Chaos Gods!

campaign_post_battle_captive_options.description: Slaughter the captives in the name of the Chaos Gods!

description.last_approved_text: Leave no grudge unavenged, kill all captives! The enemy and their allies will despise you for such a dishonourable action, but their foes will rejoice!

campaign_post_battle_captive_options.description: Leave no grudge unavenged, kill all captives! The enemy and their allies will despise you for such a dishonourable action, but their foes will rejoice!

description.last_approved_text: Kill 'em all! The enemy and their allies will really hate you for this, but da enemy’s enemy will appreciate it…

campaign_post_battle_captive_options.description: Kill 'em all! The enemy and their allies will really hate you for this, but da enemy’s enemy will appreciate it…

description.last_approved_text: Leave no captives alive. The foe and their allies will not look upon you kindly, but their enemies will respect your decision.

campaign_post_battle_captive_options.description: Leave no captives alive. The foe and their allies will not look upon you kindly, but their enemies will respect your decision.

description.last_approved_text: Feed them to the Dire Wolves, their corpses will no doubt come in handy later! The victims' empire and their allies will loathe you, but their enemies will like it.

campaign_post_battle_captive_options.description: Feed them to the Dire Wolves, their corpses will no doubt come in handy later! The victims' empire and their allies will loathe you, but their enemies will like it.

description.last_approved_text: Slaughter the captives in the name of the Chaos Gods!

campaign_post_battle_captive_options.description: Slaughter the captives in the name of the Chaos Gods!

description.last_approved_text: Leave no captives alive. The foe and their allies will not look upon you kindly, but their enemies will respect your decision.

campaign_post_battle_captive_options.description: Leave no captives alive. The foe and their allies will not look upon you kindly, but their enemies will respect your decision.

description.last_approved_text: Although certainly not a chivalrous act, we can ransom these men back to their masters in return for some coin.

campaign_post_battle_captive_options.description: Although certainly not a chivalrous act, we can ransom these men back to their masters in return for some coin.

description.last_approved_text: Offer these captives to the Chaos Gods in return for their favour.

campaign_post_battle_captive_options.description: Offer these captives to the Chaos Gods in return for their favour.

description.last_approved_text: A grudge has been settled, the honourable thing is to allow the captives to leave. Not that it matters, but the enemy will look upon us favourably.

campaign_post_battle_captive_options.description: A grudge has been settled, the honourable thing is to allow the captives to leave. Not that it matters, but the enemy will look upon us favourably.

description.last_approved_text: Earn some extra loot by selling the captives off! The enemy will even thank ya for not eatin' 'em alive.

campaign_post_battle_captive_options.description: Earn some extra loot by selling the captives off! The enemy will even thank ya for not eatin' 'em alive.

description.last_approved_text: Allow these warriors to return to their homelands, for a ransom. Despite dipping into their treasury, the enemy will appreciate such a deed.

campaign_post_battle_captive_options.description: Allow these warriors to return to their homelands, for a ransom. Despite dipping into their treasury, the enemy will appreciate such a deed.

description.last_approved_text: Send the captives to their homes, unspoilt… for a price. The enemy will show gratitude, allowing you to further your machinations.

campaign_post_battle_captive_options.description: Send the captives to their homes, unspoilt… for a price. The enemy will show gratitude, allowing you to further your machinations.

description.last_approved_text: Offer these captives to the Chaos Gods in return for their favour. Offering captives to the Chaos Gods ensures their favour, but your herd will be hungry and unhappy as a result.

campaign_post_battle_captive_options.description: Offer these captives to the Chaos Gods in return for their favour. Offering captives to the Chaos Gods ensures their favour, but your herd will be hungry and unhappy as a result.

description.last_approved_text: Allow these warriors to return to their homelands, for a ransom. Despite dipping into their treasury, the enemy will appreciate such a deed.

campaign_post_battle_captive_options.description: Allow these warriors to return to their homelands, for a ransom. Despite dipping into their treasury, the enemy will appreciate such a deed.
